CHAT.comment: Transcriber 1 Terri Schilthorn 19-JUL-89 Transcriber 2 Terri Schilthorn 13-MAR-90

u.a: wants C to put toys in wagon
referring to cookie container C is carrying .
M opens and pours juice into C's cup
M hands C napkin and C wipes up juice
pause while M and C eat
C eats and M closes cookie container
M and C eat; staring at each other
pause while M and C eat
<bef> C makes smacking noises while eating
gestures to some unknown object away from table
pause while M and C eat
pause while M and C eat
scoots C's chair up to table
pause while M and C eat
points to unknown object away from table
still pointing to an unknown object
referring to C's name for the wagon
pause while C looks at object and M eats
reaches out to touch M's hair
moves around table towards cookie container
points to C's cookie at his place
M gets another cookie out of container
